TopicTitle: VAB: Lockable assemblies, stages and named vehicles

Articles.Content:
As we build small vehicles and integrate them in larger ones, it's becoming a pain to select them and reorganize the stages every time we make a change.

Please, it would be very helpful to be able to group parts as lockable assemblies which can be selected and moved as one.

It would be great to also be able to lock the staging for an assembly.

And if the locked assembly is a vehicle, we should be able to save multiple named vehicles in a workspace. Importing from workspaces should be done by selecting the desired vehicle from inside the assembly.

Also, grouping fuel tanks should be reflected in the Resources Manager.

Thank you!
